SCENE FROM TRAGEDY FROM THE GERMAN ACTED LAST NIGHT.
The Reckoning,“ translated from the German, Liebelei,“ was acted for the
first time here in English in the Berkeley Lyceum Theatre. From left to right in
the picturé are Mr. John Dean, Mr. Robert Conness, Miss Phyllis Rankin and Miss

SCENE FROM TRAGEDY FROM THE GERMAN ACTED LAST NIGHT. The Reckoning,“ translated from the German, Liebelei,“ was acted for the first time here in English in the Berkeley Lyceum Theatre. From left to right in the picturé are Mr. John Dean, Mr. Robert Conness, Miss Phyllis Rankin and Miss Katherine Grey.
